rules.name: Budget_Increase
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 18 AND (2 OR 3 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11)
rules.label: Budget Increase

rules.name: Budget_Decrease
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 18 AND (2 OR 3 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11)
rules.label: Budget Decrease

decisions.description: Run flow only if automation toggle is on

decisions.label: What was the status changed to?

rightValue.stringValue: Just remove this condition to start copy check cases again

rules.name: Field_Change
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 11 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16)
rules.label: Field Change

textTemplates.name: CampaignMediaBuyTypeChangeChatterPost
textTemplates.text: The campaign media buy type was changed from {!$Record__Prior.Campaign_Media_Buy_Type__c} to {!$Record.Campaign_Media_Buy_Type__c}

textTemplates.name: Chatter_Ready_to_Push
textTemplates.text: Hey, @[{!$Record.Media_Owner__r.Id}] {!$Record.Name} is ready to push live! Just FYI @[{!$Record.Demand_Owner__r.Id}]

textTemplates.name: PauseChatterNotification
textTemplates.text: Case sent to @[{!$Record.Media_Owner__r.Id}] to fill in the Media Pause Date/Time or check the Pause Immediately field.
